title: Feeling The Heat
description: This bounty hunter always gets his man. And if he's lucky, he'll get his woman, too. Into bed, that is...When Linc Stone agreed to help an irresistibly sexy wedding planner track down her louse of an ex-boyfriend, all he'd really intended to do was keep a spitfire looking for payback out of trouble. But being around Georgia Hart and keeping his hands off her was hard-the chemistry was explosive, hotter than even a dedicated, lean, mean hunting machine like Linc could withstand.Especially when each night they spent together promised a new "thrill" of the chase...
author: Rhonda Nelson
